activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13310
activity.text:
I would like to work on this issue

I will make three changes  to the `TagConfigCard` component:  

1. **Badge styling** – Added `className="whitespace-nowrap"` to badges to prevent text from breaking into multiple lines.  
2. **Tag name size** – Adjusted heading to use a smaller `text-lg` class instead of larger text for better fit on small screens.  
3. **View button** – Added `{t("view")}` text next to the arrow icon to make the button more descriptive.  

**Expected Timeline:**  
End date:  9th aug 2025

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13314
activity.text:
I would like to work on this issue

I will add `international={true}` to make the phone input always use international format and swap the country code when the flag changes.  
I also add `countryCallingCodeEditable={false}` to prevent accidental deletion of the country code.  
This improves the user experience by keeping phone numbers consistent and avoiding format errors.

**Expected Timeline:**  
End date: 9th august 2025

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13312
activity.text:
i woud like to work on this issue

I will solve the issue by ensuring all string fields in the validation schemas use .trim() before applying .min(1, "...") validation. This removes accidental leading or trailing spaces from user inputs before checking if the value is empty.


Expected Timeline:
End date: 09-08- 2025
